item.title: Lifehouse - Hanging By A Moment
item.description:
Desperate for changing
starving for truth
Closer to
where I started
In chasing after you
I’m falling even more
In love with you
letting go of all
I’ve held on to
I’m standing here
Until you make me move
I’m hanging
By a moment
here with you
Forgetting
all I’m lacking
Completly
and complete
I’ll take your
invitation
You take all of me
now falling even more
In love with you
letting go of all
I’ve held on to
I’m standing here
Until you make me move
I’m hanging
By a moment
here with you
Living for
the only thing
I know I’m running
here and crashing
Where to go
I don’t know
What I’m diving
into just hanging
By a moment
here with you
There’s nothing
else to lose
There’s nothing
else to find
There’s nothing
in the world
That can change
my mind
There is nothing else
there is nothing else
There is nothing
else-

for changing

Make me move

just hanging

by a moment
Hanging by a moment

here with you-
